channel.title: Softlayer_container_metric_tracking_object_virtual_host_details on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Metric_Tracking_Object_Virtual_Host_Details
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Metric_Tracking_Object_Virtual_Host_Details Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Metric_Tracking_Object_Virtual_Host_Details This container details a virtual host’s metric data. seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Metric_Tracking_Object_Virtual_Host_Summary Local day The day this metric was collected. Type: dateTime maxInstances The maximum number of guests hosted by this platform for the given day. Type: integer maxMemoryUsage The maximum amount of memory utilized by this platform for the given day.
